line_1: Some lonely Island bare and bleak;
line_2: Far on a foreign shore I'll seek

line_1: — So in green vales amid her mountains bleak
line_2: BUXTONIA smiles, the Goddess-Nymyh of Peak;

line_1: If 'midst heart-chilling damps, and winter bleak,
line_2: If meagre Famine paint your pallid cheek,

line_1: When Hallow-e'en blows chill and bleak,
line_2: Then anger tinged the maid's round cheek —

line_1: Where, as proud Masson rises rude and bleak,
line_2: And with mishapen turrets crests the Peak,

line_1: In torrid climes, in regions cold and bleak,
line_2: In every land and language wilt thou speak.
